title: Italian grissini
description: These easy breadsticks are made with blue cheese, parmesan, garlic, jalapeños and Italian seasoning. Great with your favourite dips.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz plain white bread flour, plus extra for flouring
1 tbsp olive oil, plus extra for oiling
5 tbsp grated parmesan (or similar vegetarian cheese)
2 tbsp chopped jalapeños, from a jar
50g/1¾oz grated parmesan (or similar vegetarian hard cheese)
